page.title: 13Services In Swineshead
page.content: The Post Office is situated at 1 Green Lane and has been run by the present postmistress for the last 4 years. It serves the whole of the village. Anything from a stamp to a postal order, pay your TV licence or cash your unemployment benefit can be transacted here. The post itself is delivered by another lady who manages to get round the whole village with letters and parcels come rain or shine. The Five Bells Public House is situated in the High Street. Here you can get anything from a pint of beer to a meal in the pubs restaurant. It also has a room which can be hired out for private functions. All the beer served at the pub is Charles Wells, which is brewed in Bedford.
